nodes.text: Kess Bela was an asteroid belt located between the planets Cala and Ilum in the Ilum system in the Unknown Regions.

Kess Bela was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which was authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry. In contrast, the 2016 Star Wars Roleplaying sourcebook Nexus of Power, published by Fantasy Flight Games, claims that the Ilum system did not contain any asteroid belts.
